name: Matrix Service Company
description: Matrix Service Company is a leading provider of engineering, construction, and maintenance services to the energy and industrial sectors. Established in 1980 and headquartered in Tulsa, Oklahoma, the company operates through several segments, including Storage Solutions, Industrial Services, and Utility Services. Matrix Service specializes in the construction and maintenance of large-scale storage tanks, terminals, and pipelines, as well as providing a range of industrial and utility services such as electrical and instrumentation work, heavy civil construction, and fabrication. With a commitment to safety and quality, Matrix Service Company leverages its extensive industry experience to deliver value-driven solutions to its clients. The company serves a diverse clientele, including oil and gas, power generation, and chemical industries, and is recognized for its innovative approaches to project execution and operational efficiency. Matrix Service Company is dedicated to building long-term relationships with its clients by providing comprehensive services that meet their specific needs while adhering to the highest standards of safety and environmental stewardship.
